segmentosSRT.text: I am very sorry, but you've got nothing left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text:
What could you stake the bet on?
We don't accept empty bets.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: Anyway, your life's worth little now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: We'll formalize the transfer in a few days...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: and explain to your old man.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text:
- What are you doing?
- They're shooting!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: What did you think you were doing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text:
Look at all the chili sauce.
Let me see your eyes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text:
- Trying to kill him, or what?
- They're just kids.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: Kids? Where did he learn that from?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: This hasn't anything to do with us adults.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text:
It's sabotage.
Sabotage to the communal kitchen.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: And sabotage of the Great Leap Forward!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: That kid could not dream that up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: Comrade, could I look at that one?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: Red Guards are swarming over the place.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: Do as Mommy says and push.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: to educate him, to criticize him...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28

segmentosSRT.text: and to let him witness her giving birth.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_28
